lines.text: Baseball cards? I LOVE baseball cards! -Got 'em, got 'em, need 'em got 'em, got 'em got 'em, need 'em, got 'em, need 'em, need 'em, got 'em, need 'em, need 'em got 'em, got 'em need 'em!
We take the shit, we smash the shit, and then we put the shit back.
A man's best friend, His right hand.
Dad! A MONS... ter.
What are you doing Brian? What the hell is going on? Look at this mess.
[Lifts his foot]
What the hell am I stepping in? Doritos? Jesus...!
I'll clean it up.
You're damn right you will! Now get back in that bed Mr!
Wait, Dad there was a *monster* here. You've *gotta* believe me!
Brian, it's a pile of clothes! You're wrestling a pile of clothes!
[Brian smiles softly]
What's so funny?
[Brian looks at his dad and his smile instantly fades]
We're the reasons why brothers hate their sisters!

[after peeing in Ronny's apple juice]
Ronny's gonna be pissed!
You got your stupid remote control back. Now how about lighting a candle or something? These lights are painful.

[studies remote]
Hey, what about the batteries?
I ate 'em for breakfast. I'd give 'em to ya right now but double A battries constipate me, ok? How bout a little later?
That's gross.
Who put piss in my apple juice?
Trick or treat, smell my feet!
Ooh, let me get it.
[picks Brian's nose]
Hmm yum, you know I thought it would be good but it's snot. Ha Ha!
Don't worry it's just a drill!
Ow! Window pane
We're in somebody elses house!
No! Duh! Well, where did you park your squad car, Dick Tracy?

[watching Gypo drink whiskey]
You've eradicated the whole bottle!
